lead_paragraph: GUTH--Polly Wheeler. Asia Society's Board of Trustees and staff mourn the passing of a passionate and generous member of our global family. The legacy of John and Polly Guth, particularly the exhibitions they made possible, lives on in our work and in our hearts. Josette Sheeran, President & CEO; Henrietta H. Fore & Ronnie C. Chan, Global Co-Chairs, Asia Society 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GUTH, POLLY WHEELER
